name: mega-anchor
effect: Unused. This is Archie’s Key Stone in Omega Ruby and Alpha Sapphire, but it cannot be obtained by the player.

flavor_text.sun_moon: This anchor contains an untold power that somehow enables Pokémon carrying a Mega Stone to Mega Evolve in battle.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: This anchor contains an untold power that somehow enables Pokémon carrying a Mega Stone to Mega Evolve in battle.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: This anchor contains an untold power that somehow enables Pokémon carrying a Mega Stone to Mega Evolve in battle.
